Care of the newborn 
/circle6 Place an identity label with the mother’s name and any other identifi  cation information 
as may be required on the baby’s wrist or ankle, if not done earlier. 
/circle6 Give the baby a vitamin K injection 1.0 mg, intra muscular to all newborns weighing
